TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit TextPatternIdentifiers extends System.Object
public ref class TextPatternIdentifiers abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含用作 的标识符的值。

span.span: Contains values used as identifiers for .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公开的详细信息的对象，如编辑控件和文档的文本内容。 exposes detailed information of the textual contents of objects such as edit controls and documents. 应编写 UI 自动化提供程序，以便它们可以在部分信任环境下工作。UI Automation providers should be written so that they can work in a partial-trust environment. 因为 UIAutomationClient.dll 未配置为完全信任，在提供程序代码不应引用该程序集。Because UIAutomationClient.dll is not configured for full trust, your provider code should not reference that assembly. 如果情况如此，则代码可以在完全信任环境中运行，但无法在部分信任环境中运行。If it does so, the code may run in a full-trust environment but then fail in a partial-trust environment. 特别是，不要使用 UIAutomationClient.dll 中类的字段，例如 中的字段。In particular, do not use fields from classes in UIAutomationClient.dll such as those in . 请改用 UIAutomationTypes.dll 中类的等效字段，如 。Instead, use the equivalent fields from classes in UIAutomationTypes.dll, such as .

related.span: UI 自动化提供程序概述

span.span: UI Automation Providers Overview

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画; 仅在屏幕上显示经过动画处理的文本打印，但动画效果却没有。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 。The default value is .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识细化到子语言级别的文本范围的 Culture () 特性；例如，瑞士法语 (fr-CH)，而不是法语 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the Culture () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 请参阅的语言代码格式的详细信息。See for more detail on the language code format. 默认值为应用程序用户界面的语言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. > [!NOTE] > 可能存在的服务器不支持的语言标记或作者不能使用它的情况。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在这些情况下将应用默认值。In those cases the default applies.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontNameAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 FontName 特性。

span.span: Identifies the FontName attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 示例包括"Arial Black"和"Arial 窄"。Examples include "Arial Black" and "Arial Narrow". 值为非本地化。Values are non-localized. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是`empty string`。The default value is an `empty string`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 FontWeight 特性。

span.span: Identifies the FontWeight attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用的一种字体的相对笔画粗细。Refers to the relative stroke, thickness or boldness of a font. 这模仿`lfWeight`GDI LOGFONT 中的字段。This is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in GDI LOGFONT. 为了保持一致，以下值已采用从 LOGFONT: 0 = DontCare，100 = 瘦客户端，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 浅，400 = 正常或常规，500 = 中等; 600 = 本或 DemiBold，700 = 加粗，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold，以及 900 = 频繁或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`.

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 ForegroundColor (COLORREF) 属性。

span.span: Identifies the ForegroundColor (COLORREF) attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前景色相当于文本或字体颜色。Foreground color is equivalent to the text or font color. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalTextAlignmentAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落水平文本对齐方式。The horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值是类型的Values for this attribute are of type 默认值为 The default value is

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IndentationFirstLineAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 IndentationFirstLine () 特性。

span.span: Identifies the IndentationFirstLine () attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一个行缩进 (指定为单位类型值) 应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落。The first-line indentation (specified as a unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 前导缩进 (指定为单位类型值) 应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落。The leading indentation (specified as a unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尾随的缩进 (指定为单位类型值) 应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落。The trailing indentation (specified as a unit type value) applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly IsReadOnlyAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 IsReadOnly 特性。

span.span: Identifies the IsReadOnly attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与调用的文本范围关联的文档的只读状态。The read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文档或文件是只读的但仍可以对其进行编辑，并将其保存为另一个文件，则不会认为该文本，只读的。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `false`。The default value is `false`.

summary.span: 标识给定特性的值是否在 Rich Edit 控件中的某个文本范围内发生变化。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回`TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue`以指示此变体，而不是属性值的集合。 returns `TextPattern.MixedAttributeValue` to indicate this variation instead of a collection of attribute values. 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 标识每当修改文本选择时引发的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised whenever the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些文本控件作为零宽度文本选择处理文本插入点 （光标） 和可能引发`TextSelectionChangedEvent`当移动游标。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 若要跟随光标的移动，UI 自动化客户端建议将跟踪通过侦听对应的插入点的变化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素事件，而不是具体取决于。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . 此标识符由[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]提供程序。This identifier is used by [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] providers. 客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。Client applications should use the equivalent field in .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly UnderlineColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 UnderlineColor 特性。

span.span: Identifies the UnderlineColor attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此标识符由 UI 自动化提供程序使用。This identifier is used by UI Automation providers. UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。The default value is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
